title: Riot Support
body:
Anyone know the average response time from a real riot support member? I have received an email from the blitz crank bot, but since then its been quite. Just trying to recover an old account so I can with all my champs again.

Thanks!

replies.body: Response time may be a bit currently depending on the size of the queue for the day.  Just make sure not to reply to your ticket until you receive a response, or you may return to the bottom of the queue.  After a blitzbot response, the ticket may be escalated to our account team who can help out with your recovery.  We will respond as soon as we can!
Thank you, I unfortunately did reply because i wanted to add more info to help find my old account. Thank you for replying!
